resources.string: We the “Liron Automotives Pvt. Ltd.”One of the India’s Rising E- Mobility solution providing company. We are primarily engaged in designing and manufacturing of e-scooters and hybrid bike solutions.

Having customer focus and Team work as a core values, we the Liron Automotive will dedicate ourselves to deliver world’s best e-mobility solution at very competitive cost. We design products and experiences that fit seamlessly into our society so we can achieve our zero emission goals.

Our focus on connecting aspirations and our tech-enabled products keeps us at the forefront of the market. Our every product and service is based on the belief that we are here to make our customers life better.
Our experienced team of engineers inspires, motivates and guides the organization to greater success by defining new innovating and exciting horizons to scale.

Our strong focus on manufacturing excellence ensures that our product will meet the highest standards of quality. Today, we are with state of the art infrastructure having integral facilities for everything from design to delivery under one roof.
1) Only individuals who fulfil the necessary requirements are allowed to ride. These requirements are governed by country-specific provisions.

2) Do not carry out any alterations to the Scooter other than installing genuine Liron accessories. Removing original parts and installing replacement parts that are not authorised by the manufacturer can make the scooter unsafe and result in risk to life and limb as well as invalidating the type approval.

3) Always use the lights when riding at night or in conditions with low visibility. Only ride during suitable weather conditions. Do not ride the Scooter when there is hard-packed snow or black ice. Wet or slippery roads increase braking distances and the risk of accidents.
4) The tires have a groove profile, and so you should be careful when riding on wet, sandy or other slippery surfaces.
5) Do not use the charger during thunderstorms
6) Never touch the charger or connector with wet hands
7) The charger and battery are not toys and must be kept away from children.
8) Avoid excessive exposure to sunlight (risk of overheating!).

We the “Liron Automotives Pvt. Ltd.”One of the India’s Rising E- Mobility solution providing company. We are primarily engaged in designing and manufacturing of e-scooters and hybrid bike solutions.
